participant_1.background:

i am a mother of two beautiful boys.
i only eat organic food.

participant_2.background:
I am single and live with my three cats.
I'm proud of my work ethic and dedication to my craft.
I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.
I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests.
I'm a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting.

content.text: I'm a mother of two beautiful boys and I have a dog named Petrucci. What about you?
I'm single and live with my three cats. I'm a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting.
What kind of music do you like to create?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm especially passionate about rock and roll. I like to play guitar and sing.
I love rock and roll too! I play the drums and I sing a little bit.
That's awesome! I'm always looking for people to play music with.
Great! I'll send you a message.
